channel.title: Halo 3 VS Call of Duty: World at War
channel.description:
Well, I didn't know if this belonged in the Discussions and Debates section. But since these ARE both video games, I put them in this section.
Vote in the poll and reason your answer.

item.title: Halo 3 VS Call of Duty: World at War
item.dc:creator: @LNPP_raptors LNPP raptors
item.description:
@LNPP_raptors wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:22, topic:256733”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=339081.msg2656717#msg2656717 date=1233924069]
Halo skill??
[/quote]

^^

Halo is the game that requires no skill at all. Call of Duty 5 requires a lot more skill then halo.

[size=2pt]Don’t let Thuglife see this post, he’ll say CoD requires no skill at all.[/size] in halo 3 you all start with the same weapon who ever knows how to use this weapon he is skill isnt that right? and cod : waw you start with the weapon you like , and this weapon maybe strong , weak , overpower, etc…[/quote]

item.description:

[quote=“chassy13, post:9, topic:256733”]Of course that sounds like a lot, but eventually new games will come out and WaW will die down to where Halo 3 is at, and Halo 4 or something will come out and will be a hit, and repeat.

But I am probably going to buy WaW today.[/quote]

Wasn’t Halo 3 a trilogy? Thus Halo 4 would make Halo the first trilogy to contain 4.
